cause.description:
I believe that celebrities and rich people should face the same justice system as you or I, if we ever did these horrible things to these dogs we would be punished to the severity of the law so I think its only fair the Mike Vick faces the same justice.
1. Mike Vick must be punished
cause.mission: Punish Mike Vick For His Crimes.
cause.name: Send Mike Vick To Jail!!!!!
